thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 27 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Torex Semiconductor to issue new shares and announces private placement of treasury stock

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Torex Semiconductor to issue new shares and announces private placement of treasury stock
text:
Feb 27(Reuters) - Torex Semiconductor Ltd
* Says it will issue 1.6 million new shares through public offering
* Says it will distribute 262,500 shares of its treasury common stock through private placement to Nomura Securities Co., Ltd., with subscription date on March 28 and payment date on March 29
* Proceeds to be used to invest in unit, to buy equipment and software and to repay loan
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/LESfUJ
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
